Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model

Class CardsHeld

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.Model.CardsHeld
public class CardsHeld extends Observable
The CardsHeld class represents the collection of cards held by a player. It extends the Observable class, allowing observers to subscribe and receive updates when changes occur in the cards held.

  • Field Summary

    • getCardPlayability

      public boolean getCardPlayability(int cardIndex)
      Retrieves the playability status of a specific held card by its index.
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - The index of the card to check.
      Returns:
      `true` if the card is playable; `false` otherwise.
